bibl.title: The Demography of Roman Egypt. Foreword by Ansley J. COALE. Paperback Version. (Cambridge Studies in Population, Economy and Society in Past Time. 23.)
bibl.note: 1st edition: 1994. - The paperback version includes a supplement to the catalogue of census declarations (pp. 313-326).
